maths_numbers.title: Numbers and Counting
maths_numbers.content: This topic introduces pupils to numbers 1–20 with songs, objects, and exercises for practice.

english_alphabets.title: Alphabets & Spelling
english_alphabets.content: Children learn A–Z letters, sounds, and simple spelling activities with fun examples.

science_animals.title: Animals & Habitats
science_animals.content: Pupils will study common animals, their sounds, and where they live (land, water, air).
